thread.title: Stephanie Emma Franken
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Stephanie Emma Franken

author: Stephanie Emma Franken
title: Stephanie Emma Franken
text: I find it impossible to complain about thriftbooks. Vast selection at great prices, and they ship quickly. All while you're keeping books out of landfills and reducing your carbon footprint by not chopping down more trees for paper. All books have arrived in excellent reading condition, regardless of the selected grade.
